original_text: For he himself is our peace, who has made the two groups one and has destroyed the barrier, the dividing wall of hostility,
korean_text: 그는 우리의 화평이신지라 둘로 하나를 만드사 원수 된 것 곧 중간에 막힌 담을 자기 육체로 허시고

sentences.original_text: For he himself is our peace,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그분 자신이 우리의 평화이시기 때문이니,

sentences.original_text: who has made the two groups one
